channel.title: Exstacy for the first time
channel.description: Can anyone give me any tips what not to do when takin this for the first time. I have heard alot from people but alot of you here seem to be experts on drugs lol so any tips would be great.

item.title: Exstacy for the first time
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“OnlyOneRule, post:1, topic:264443”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=348838.msg2684487#msg2684487 date=1235592259]
There is no conceivable reason why he would have to have his stomach pumped after taking MDMA. There was either something else in the pill, or he overdosed (which didn’t happen).
[/quote]
I think he probobally had taken something else aswell. Because some other guys took some of his exstacy aswell but it didn’t have much effect. But he was the one dealing them out so an overdose is highly possible.[/quote]

I wouldn’t say highly. Assuming relatively high-MDMA content on the pills, he’d still have to eat 30 or so (likely more, 5g is the LD50 & 100mg per pill is a good rough guideline for good quality pills) at roughly the same time to OD.

(Not saying you can’t die from MDMA, just that its more likely to be something else than OD, its a fairly non toxic chemical)

Read full topic

item.title: Exstacy for the first time
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

dont take any if you’re not relaxed or have something on your mind. imo, to get the full effects of E (havent done any pills yet though), you have to be relaxed. make sure you have plenty of weed/cigerretes cos smoking is fucking good. dont drink on them, or things might start to get messy. Also, try and piss every now and then. if you have a high dose, might get hard to piss, but at least give it a go. as mopman said, drink, but dont over drink.

most importantly though, make sure you got plenty of music!

Read full topic

item.title: Exstacy for the first time
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Holy christ what is with all these drug threads [quote=“pesky, post:12, topic:264154”]hmm… upset as in… sad, depressed anything really, sorta like booze, if u drink when you are depressed u will just get worse, if you drink when your happy u will get happier, just its like an extreme with Es…example, my neice (18) was horney and she took like 2 and started orgasming on the floor… yes she tells me these things XD[/quote]

Not really. You’re not going to be angry or sad on ecstasy. Maybe coming down when your not high anymore. I would even say it’s impossible to be angry =/ Girls get horny on ecstasy… guys not as much. Most people can’t even get a boner on it.

Why is there so many damn drug threads. We should keep the questions contained in like a single drug thread or something. We used to have one wherever it went.

Read full topic
